    • seatBookingView

      public static void seatBookingView(Cinema chosenCinema, Shows chosenShow, ArrayList<showSeat> listShowSeats, User loginUser, int option) throws IOException
      Seat selection view, allows user to choose seats to book and then proceed to payment
      Parameters:
      chosenCinema - cinema selected for the showtime
      chosenShow - selected showtime
      listShowSeats - arraylist of showseats for the selected showtime
      loginUser - user object
      option - option chosen for the senior/student/normal ticket
      Throws:
      IOException
